mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE name=#{name} AND telNum=#{telNum};
SELECT * FROM member WHERE name=#{name} AND telNum=#{telNum} AND emailId=#{emailId};

SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COUPON WHERE member_idx = #{sIdx}) AS coupon_Count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orderhistory_detail ohd JOIN orderhistory oh ON oh.idx = ohd.orderhistory_idx WHERE ohd.status = '구매확정' AND ohd.review_status = '미작성' AND oh.member_idx = #{sIdx}) AS review_Count FROM member WHERE idx = #{sIdx};
SELECT todayVisitCnt FROM member WHERE emailId = #{vo.emailId};
SELECT * FROM member WHERE DATE(birthday) = CURDATE();

SELECT g.name AS goods_Name, g.idx AS goods_Idx, g.thumbnail AS goods_ThumbNail, go.goods_option AS goods_Option, b.name as goods_Brand FROM orderhistory_detail ohd JOIN goods g ON g.idx = ohd.goods_Idx JOIN brand b ON b.idx = g.brand_Idx JOIN goods_option go ON go.option_idx = ohd.option_Idx WHERE ohd.idx = #{orderHistory_Detail_Idx};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon(idx, member_idx, name, dcpercentage, issuedDate, usageDate, status) VALUES(default, (SELECT idx FROM member ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 0, 1), #{coupon_Name}, #{percentage}, default, default, default);
INSERT INTO review VALUES(default, #{vo.goods_Idx}, #{vo.member_Idx}, #{vo.orderHistory_Detail_Idx}, #{vo.FSname}, #{vo.FName}, #{vo.content}, 5, default, default);
mapper.update: UPDATE orderHistory_detail SET review_status = '작성완료' WHERE idx = #{orderHistory_Detail_Idx};
UPDATE member SET point = point + 100 WHERE emailId = #{vo.emailId};
UPDATE member SET totVisitCnt = totVisitCnt + 1, todayVisitCnt = todayVisitCnt+1, lastVisitDay = NOW() WHERE emailId = #{vo.emailId};
UPDATE member SET pwd = #{updatePwd} WHERE emailId = #{emailIdForm};
UPDATE orderhistory_detail SET status = '구매확정' WHERE idx = #{orderHistory_Detail_Idx};
